Posts.EditableText: Hi I'm a n00b and so i don't really know how long a text adventure has to be for people to laugh the most I'm writing in comedy categories.
Posts.HTML: Hi I'm a n00b and so i don't really know how long a text adventure has to be for people to laugh the most I'm writing in comedy categories.

Posts.EditableText:
I guess ```playtime + lvl of fun = amount of laughs. ```
In other words, it's not about the length, it's about how well written it is (and how funny it is). If it's poorly executed people won't keep playing it no matter how funny.
Posts.HTML:
